**Behinderte Menschen**, deren Grad der: **Impaired persons** whose level of disability does not merely temporarily amount to at least 80, who are constantly unable to partake in public events due to their impairment, and who have been granted the **"RF" mark**.
**Blinde** oder **nicht nur vorübergehen: **Blind** or **not merely temporarily visually impaired persons** with a degree of disablity of at least 60 who have been granted the **"RF" mark ** due to their visual impairment only.
**Hörgeschädigte Menschen**, die gehörlo: **Hearing-impaired persons** who are deaf or who are unable to sufficiently communicate aurally with hearing aids and have been granted the **"RF" mark ** due to their impairment.
**Sonderfürsorgeberechtigte** im Sinne d: **Pesons entitled to special care** according to § 27e Bundesversorgungsgesetz (Federal Law on war pensions - BVG).
**Volljährige**, die im Rahmen einer Lei: **Adults** receiving youth welfare assistance under SGB VIII (German Social Code Vol. VIII) and **living** in a **residential home for young adults** under section 45 SGB VIII (German Social Code Vol. VIII)
Ausbildungsgeld (SGB III): Ausbildungsgeld (Educational assistance for the disabled, SGB III -- German Social Code Vol. III)
Behinderte Menschen mit einem Grad der B: Blind or visually impaired persons with a degree of disability of at least 80
Bei Anspruch auf eine Befreiung von der: If you want to apply for an exemption from or reduction of the German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee, you need to fill in an online form. The form will guide you through the application process. You do not need to file a separate application form.
Bitte beachten Sie auch unseren Datensch: Please comply with our privacy policy
Blinde oder sehbehinderte Menschen mit e: Blind or visually impaired persons with a degree of disability of at least 60
Blindenhilfe (SGB XII): Aid to the blind (SGB XII -- German Social Code Vol. XII)
Die 9-stellige Beitragsnummer (früher Te: You will find the 9-digit subscription number (formerly called "user number") on your registration form, your account statement, or the payment request.
Die Einkommensüberschreitung liegt unter: Do you exceed the income limit by less than €17.50?
Eine Ermäßigung des Rundfunkbeitrags ist: You are eligible for a German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee reduction only if you have been granted the "RF" mark. Since you have not been granted the "RF" mark, your request cannot be processed further.
Empfänger von **Ausbildungsförderung** n: Recipients of **educational funding** under the Bundesausbildungsförderungsgesetz (BAföG, Federal Training Assistance Act) who do **not** live with their parents.
Empfänger von **Ausbildungsgeld** nach §: Recipients of educational assistance for disabled people under sections 104 following SGB III who are **not** living with their parents
Empfänger von **Berufsausbildungsbeihilf: Recipients of **Berufsausbildungsbeihilfe** (BAB, Vocational training assistance) under Sections 114, 115 No. 2 SGB III (German Social Code Vol. III) or Chapter 3, Paragraph 3, sub-paragraph 3 SGB III who are **not** living with their parents
Empfänger von **Grundsicherung im Alter: Recipients of **basic pension for the elderly or disabled** (Chapter 4 SGB XII -- German Social Code Vol. XII)
Empfänger von **Hilfe zum Lebensunterhal: Recipients of "**social benefits** under SGB XII (German Social Code Vol. XII), Chapter 3 or Sections 27a or 27d of BVG (German Federal War Victims Relief Act)
Empfänger von **Hilfe zur Pflege** nach: Recipients of home care assistance under chapter 7 SGB XII, or home care assistance as a service of the assistance for victims of war crimes BVG, or home care funds as per national regulations.
Empfänger von **Pflegezulagen** nach § 2: Recipients of **maintenance assistance** under section 267 subsection 1 LAG (German Equalization of Burdens Act) or persons who have been granted an allowance on the basis of their need for care under Section 267 subsection 2 sentence 1 no. 2 letter c LAG (German Equalization of Burdens Act).
Empfänger von **Sozialgeld oder Arbeitsl: Recipients of **Sozialgeld (...) or Arbeitslosengeld II (unemployment benefits)** including benefits under Section 22 of SGB II (German Social Code Vol. II)
Empfänger von BAB können von der Rundfun: If you receive "BAB", you can only be exempted from paying for radio and television if you are not living with your parents. If you are living with your parents, the application process here cannot proceed.
Empfänger von Blindenhilfe nach § 72 des: Recipients of aid to the blind under Section 72 SGB XII (German Social Code Vol. XII) or Section 27d BVG (German Federal War Victims Relief Act)
Empfänger von Leistungen nach dem **Asyl: Recipients of benefits under the **Asylbewerberleistungsgesetz** (AsylblG, Law for the Assistance of Asylum Seekers)
Falls Sie bereits bei uns angemeldet sin: If you are already registered with us, please check if you are entitled to de-registration. For further information, click here.
Hilfe zur Pflege (SGB XII oder BVG): Benefits for home care assistance (German Social Code Vol. XII or German Federal War Victims Relief Act)
Ich habe auf Grund einer Einkommensübers: Because I exceed the income limit, I am not entitled to any of the benefits listed in section 4 sub-section 1, No. 1 to 10 RBStV (German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee Agreement).
Ich möchte befreit werden, weil ich eine: I am applying for an exemption becuase I receive one of the following benefits
Ich möchte befreit werden, weil ich kein: I am applying for an exemption because I am not entitled to any of the benefits listed in Section 4 sub-section 1, Nos. 1 to 10 RBStV (German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee Agreement)
Ich möchte befreit werden, weil ich zu e: I would like to be exempted because I belong to the following group of persons:
I am applying for an exemption or reduction for
Ich möchte eine Ermäßigung des Rundfunkb: I would like to request a reduction of the German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee because I belong to the following group of persons:
Ich wohne bei meinen Eltern?: Do you live with your parents?
Personen, denen eine der in § 4 Abs. 1 N: Persons **who, because because their incomes exceeds the limit of necessity, have been denied the social services** defined in § 4 Par. 1 Nos. 1-10 of the German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee Agreement (Rundfunkbeitragsstaatsvertrag), whereby the excess is **lower** than the amount of the German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee.
Pflegezulagen nach LAG: Maintenance assistance according to the German Equalization of Burdens Act (LAG)
Sie sind bereits mit einer Wohnung angem: Are you already registered with an address?*
Taubblindheit im Sinne des Rundfunkbeitr: According to the German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee Agreement, a person is deaf-blind when the person's good ear suffers from a "severe to profound hearing loss" and the person's good eye of this person is "severely impaired".
Um das Formular anzuzeigen, benötigen Si: You need a PDF reader to fill in the form.
Wenn Sie keine soziale Leistung wegen Ei: If you do not receive social services because you exceed the income limit, you may only receive an exemption from the German Interstate Broadcasting Contribution Fee if the excess is less than €17.50. Because you exceed the income limit by more than €17.50, this application cannot be continued.
auf Grund einer Einkommensüberschreitung: because my income exceeds the income limit.
nach SGB VIII (Kinder- und Jugendhilfe): according to SGB VIII (German Social Code Vol. VIII) (Youth welfare assistance)
